name: Limited Run: BLACKOUT EM-Drive Transparent Overdrive
description:
Limited Run: BLACKOUT EM-Drive Transparent Overdrive


   Handwired, Handbuilt in Broken Arrow, Oklahoma USA using some of the finest quality & reliable parts available. This pedal does everything from a slight boost/sparkle to a nice, warm light OD sound. Good for use as a first stage OD or a nice boost pedal.... you may find yourself leaving this on the entire gig! 

Specs:
 -NOS PIO (New Old Stock Paper In Oil) capacitors
 -Handwired Construction
 -Quality High Tolerance CTS Pots (Hand Metered & Matched)
 -Durable Flat Black powdercoated finish w/ Black ScreenPrint
 -Davies knobs
 -USA Switchcraft jacks
 -3PDT True Bypass Footswitch 
 -Hand picked and matched parts for tone and durability
 -Power: Standard 9-18V volt DC power supply with a negative center         2.1mm barrel, NO internal battery option.

           We highly recommend a quality power supply that utilizes isolated power. This would include the Voodoo Lab PP2+ or the IS0-5 and several other brands/models.  

Includes full warranty against defects in components or manufacturing. We do not have a return policy for non-defective pedals.

name: Emerson Custom Paper In Oil (PIO) Tone Capacitor
description:
Emerson Custom Paper In Oil (PIO) Tone Capacitor

- High Quality Tone Capacitor, made with premium materials for a great warm full spectrum tone.  

The Smaller the Value of the capacitor, the less highs it will roll off to ground when you fully roll down your tone pot... ie, a 0.015uf cap fully rolled back will be less dark than a 0.047uf cap. All of these values suggestions are just that... suggestions. If you have a really bright guitar we would recommend a 0.047uf. 

-Available in these values: 
      0.015uf (Recommended for use with Humbuckers) //
       [Neck Position]

      & 

      0.022uf (Recommended for use with Humbuckers)
      [Bridge Position] 

      &

      0.047uf (Recommended for use with Single Coils)

Sold Individually. (1 each = 1 Capacitor)

name: 3-Way Tele Prewired Assembly w/ an Emerson Paper in Oil Cap
description:
-Handwired in the USA

IN STOCK (SHIPS NEXY BUSINESS DAY)

This is a 3-Way Tele prewired assembly for Telecaster style guitars featuring 2 single coil pickups. It will drop into most Mexican or American Fender Teles with no modification. Wired with 22 AWG vintage push-back wire for that vintage look and sound. Soldered connections to the input jack are insulated with heat-shrink to ensure durability and long life. If you are installing this on an import guitar with metric sized pots you may need to ream your control plate holes to accept the slightly larger US-Spec pots and buy US-Spec knobs.

Includes:
- (2) CTS 250k Solid Shaft w/.250" Shaft Potentiometers (CONTROL PLATE MOUNT ONLY. PLEASE EMAIL US IF YOU NEED A LONGER SHAFT)
- (1) Oak Grigsby 3-Way Switch
- (1) Switchcraft 1/4" Mono Input Jack 
- (1) 0.047uf Emerson Paper in Oil Capacitor
- (1) Volume Mod 
- Wiring Diagram

options.name: 3-Way Tele Prewired Assembly PLUS Switch Tip

name: 5-Way Strat Prewired Assembly w/ an Emerson Paper in Oil Cap
description:
Handwired in the USA


IN STOCK (SHIPS NEXY BUSINESS DAY)

This is a prewired assembly for Stratocaster-style guitars. It will drop into most Mexican or American Fender Strats with no modification. Wired with 22 AWG vintage push-back wire for that vintage look and sound. If you are installing this on an import guitar with metric sized pots you may need to ream the pickguard holes to accept the slightly larger US-Spec pots. Soldered connections to the input jack are insulated with heat-shrink to ensure durability and long life. 

Includes: 
- (3) CTS 250k Split Shaft w/.250" Shaft Potentiometers (PICKGUARD  MOUNT ONLY. PLEASE EMAIL US IF YOU NEED A LONGER SHAFT) 
- (1) Oak Grigsby 5-Way Switch 
- (1) Switchcraft 1/4" Mono Input Jack (PREWIRED)
- (1) 0.047uf Emerson Paper in Oil Capacitor
- (1) Volume Mod 
- Wiring Diagram

name: Les Paul Prewired Assembly w/ Emerson Paper in Oil Caps
description: -Handwired in the USA ***IN STOCK, SHIPS NEXT BUSINESS DAY*** This is a prewired harness for USA Gibson Les Paul's. Carefully wired “50’s Style” and grounded with vintage correct 20 AWG bus wire for that vintage tone. For import guitars you may need to enlarge the holes for the higher quality US spec electronics to fit and also you may need US Spec knobs. Includes: • (4) 500K CTS Split Shaft Potentiometers • (1) Switchcraft J11 1/4" mono input jack (MADE IN USA) • (2) Emerson Paper in Oil Capacitors (.022uf Bridge, .015uf Neck) • (2) Volume Mods • (1) Wiring Diagram (Pre-wired 3-Way Toggle Switch Sold Separately) Click Here to Purchase

name: Prewired 3-Way Toggle Switch (Switchcraft) Short Straight [Nickel]
description:
***PLEASE NOTE: This product's leadtime is 1 week***

Prewired 3-Way Switchcraft Short Straight Toggle Switch

Here is our newly redesigned Prewired 3-Way Toggle Switch. Color coded 22 gauge pre-tinned wire makes soldering a breeze... No more cussing over getting that vintage outer braid to heat up so you can solder your grounds. Fully HeatShrunk, Wired Up like a champ and ready to throw in your Les Paul, or any other style of guitar that requires a Gibson style 3-way toggle switch. We've done all the hard work for you so that you can have a flawless and reliable sound in an easy to install package. Also the wire that we use on these kits in the same makeup of the vintage braid cloth wire that you will find in vintage guitars (Les Paul's and the like) just in an easier to install and more reliable package....

   -Fits USA made Gibson LP's, USA Made PRS's 245's, Epiphones and most other Gibson-Style imports with very little modification.

   -Made In the USA Switchcraft Toggle Switch handwired with color coded pre-tinned 22 gauge wire. All soldered switch connections are reinforced with heatshrink to ensure years of trouble-free use. 

 Total of 5 Leads:

White= Hot To Tip of Input Jack
Black (2) = 1 to the back of any pot, and 1 to the ring of the Input Jack
Yellow = Neck Hot from Switch (Middle Lug of Neck Volume Pot)
Blue = Bridge Hot from Switch (Middle Lug of Bridge Volume Pot)

   -Built to last, replace your scratchy and noisy switch today!

name: '72 Deluxe Tele Prewired Assembly w/ NOS Paper in Oil Caps
description: -Handwired in the USA ***PLEASE NOTE: This product's leadtime is 1 week*** This is a prewired harness for '72 Deluxe Tele (4-knobs). Carefully wired “50’s Style” and grounded with vintage correct 20 AWG bus wire for that vintage tone. For import guitars you may need to enlarge the holes for the higher quality US spec electronics to fit and also you may need US Spec knobs. Includes: • (4) 500K CTS Short Split Shaft Potentiometers • (1) Switchcraft J11 1/4" mono input jack (MADE IN USA) • (2) .022uf NOS (New Old Stock) K42y-2 Paper in OilCapacitors • (2) Volume Mods • (1) Wiring Diagram (Pre-wired 3-Way Toggle Switch Sold Separately) Click Here to Purchase

description:

name: Open Top Tele® Barrel Switch-Tip
description:
